title: Tamed or Captured - Novel Updates
tags: European Ambience   Female Protagonist   Male Yandere   Obsessive Love   Second Chance   Weak to Strong
author: Hong Yu-Di   홍유디
description:
“Did you think you could run away from me?” 

The Black Rose of the Empire, Karaf the Tyrant. 

Asha, who was chosen as a butterfly, failed to enlighten him and returned to the past...….

As soon as she opened her eyes, the man she met over the winter was a wild jackal, a relationship she had ignored in the past.

Aisha felt destined to love him and shared her feelings with him, but the tyrant she met again became a bit strange.

“I will make you happy. So please don't leave my side.......” 

Now, what can I do with this man, kneeling on the floor, crying miserably, with his face at my feet, and begging for forgiveness...>
